use_cases: ["Phylogenomic analysis using concatenated single-copy core genes to determine taxonomic position of KMM 296", "Pan-genome reconstruction to identify core, shell, and cloud gene clusters across Cobetia strains", "Average nucleotide identity (ANIm) calculation between KMM 296 and other Cobetia strains", "Amino acid identity (AAI) calculation between strains", "In silico DNA-DNA hybridization (dDDH) value calculation", "COG functional annotation of core and unique genes", "Identification of strain-specific singleton genes", "Core-genome phylogenetic tree construction using 1432 single-copy genes", "Determination of genomic G+C content", "Identification of alkaline phosphatase genes in the genome", "Comparative genome analysis with C. marina JCM 21022T to identify sequence insertions/deletions and chromosomal recombination"]
tools_software: ["Anvi'o", "pyANI", "ANI/AAI-Matrix", "TYGS platform", "IQ-TREE", "trimAl", "PanGP", "NCBI Prokaryotic Genome Annotation Pipeline (PGAP)", "MCL algorithm", "COG database", "CheckM"]
